titles.title: Addressing the hardships and disparities faced by Black women in order to encourage more inclusive policymaking.
Addressing the hardships and disparities faced by Black women in order to encourage more inclusive policymaking.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: This resolution supports the need for and use of certain policy frameworks to incorporate the experiences of Black women into public policies.
